title: My client lags in champ select not allowing me to pick my ban in draft mode.
body:
Every time I start a game in draft mode my league client always freezes on the "declare a champ you want to play". The counter reaches zero and I am just stuck at that part and can't do anything. By the time its my turn to select a ban or champ I can't because i'm stuck at the first part of the draft which causes me to unintentionally dodge the game because I couldn't do anything but just stare at the zero next to my name.



{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Happening to me always on champion ban phase. Connection is completely fine in every other area of the game.

Yes I'm having the same issue, and i have a beast computer that could easily run leauge. And my connection says its at 98/100, so its obviously the client thats the problem. But of course i see riot has yet to leave a useful comment on this post made almost a year ago.

Hmmm...best assumption at the moment would be that you're actually getting disconnected during champ select or possibly experiencing packet loss that's causing your inputs to not be recognized by the server.

I'd recommend going through the steps in the [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page which have solutions to the most common causes of connection issues that we see.  Lemme know if it helps!

I'm still having an issue with this.  Not sure if it helps, but what happens to me is I select the champion I want to ban/pick but the button to confirm doesn't light up for many many seconds after selection.  Lag/packet loss would make sense if it happened anywhere else in League or any other game, but it doesn't.  Plus all these people having the same issue.  

Anyone had any luck with a fix?
